name: Mad Sprocket
overview:
We created a low-cost content management system, Mad Sprocket Websites, for businesses looking to upgrade or create their web presence.

Partnering with Envato and becoming an official reseller of ThemeForest designs allows for Mad Sprocketâ€™s customers to select from a wide array of professionally designed styles to apply to their new website. Each theme sold through Mad Sprocket has been thoroughly inspected for visual fidelity, uniqueness, usability and cross-browser functionality.

Blending the flexibility of a personal hosting space and a fully-managed solution, Mad Sprocket aims to make your presence on the web affordable, hassle-free and successful. Their cost effective site setup process takes less than a week for Mad Sprocket to finish and requires no technical knowledge or work from the client to accomplish.
